TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content:
Guys, let's post images of our wannabe selves, as in like the thing that you like to imagine yourself as.

Here's mine *image snip*

What can I say, I aim high.

Also, my ideal HUMAN self is liable to get me in trouble with the mods...

Could PM it to me first for verification purposes.

I'd have to go find a pic that represents where I'd want to be.

Also, is it jut me or did I get warthunder only to not actually play it with anyone.

I know I got interested in space when I was in second or third grade, but I don't remember how. It may have been the Science Channel, or my father, but with my horrible memory, I don't know.

The thing that got me interested in science in general was my laziness. And the Discovery Channel. And the Science Channel when Discovery bought another broadcasting channel. And my intentional loneliness. And my human curiosity. And my inability to draw or paint. Y'know, i'm just gonna use something us humans call a "List".

Laziness

Disc. Channel

Loneliness (Intentional) <"I don't wanna talk about our crappy American programmes and the latest stupid fiction book, I wanna talk about Japanese Anime and Nonfiction Books!">

Nonfiction Books

Science Channel

Cant Draw/Paint

Curiosity

The Moon

The Sun

Stars

HATE of sports

Tearing apart broken computers

Computers

Video Games

Typewriters

Mechnical Things

K'Nex

Remove loneliness, nonfiction books, hate of sports, tearing apart broken computers, typewriters and mechanical things, then add animal planet, national geographic, and interest in music, and you just got a partial description of me.

Heh, we both hate sports. THe only sports i actually like are the Olympics. And fencing. Everything else really just bores me.

*kneels*

Why must you torment us?

*kicks down door to thread*

Hands up! All of you, against the wall! No one moves, no one dies!

Please note that my right arm is now a gatling gun.
lemme guess... presence in a thread of ill repute?

eh? I don't even know. Where did everyone go?

Like suddenly, everyone evaporated.
Because Mass Effect is better than Star Trek?
Well, Chobit showed up on the MC server we play, which distracted me. Can't speak for anyone else, though

Because Mass Effect is better than Star Trek?

May I kill you? Pretty please?

No killing anybody!

Maiming's good, though... You know, for the honour and favour of a lady.

Okay. *grabs the legendary rebar*

Maiming's good, though... You know, for the honour and favour of a lady.
